en.name: Speed Spell – Over Top Clear Mind R
en.effect:
Can be used by removing Speed Counters. Effects vary depending on how many Speed Counters you remove.Remove 4
Play 1 Tuner Monster from your Deck or hand.Remove 6
Once per turn, randomly play one of the following monsters from outside of your Deck. Red Dragon Archfiend / Black-Winged Dragon / Black Rose Dragon / Ancient Fairy Dragon / Life Stream Dragon (If any of these monsters in on your field or in your Graveyard, it will not be selected.)Remove 8
The ATK of Synchro Monsters you control is multiplied by 5 until the end of the turn.Remove 10
Can be used once per Duel if you have at least 3 Level 7 or 8 Dragon-Type Synchro Monsters on your field/in your Graveyard. Return all of them to your Extra Deck, and then play 1 "Shooting Quasar Dragon" from outside of your Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) The maximum number of attacks per Battle Phase of the monster played with this Skill equals the number of monsters returned to your Extra Deck.

yugipedia.name: Speed Spell – Over Top Clear Mind R
